careers.title: Genetics Lab Assistant
careers.whyThis: Genetics Lab Assistant will help you build your Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Genetics Lab Assistant involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Genetics Lab Assistant now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: Forensic Scientist will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Forensic Scientist you still need inquiry skills like evaluating. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Forensic Scientist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Forensic Scientist now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Electrician
careers.whyThis: Electrician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Electrician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Electrician now and understand what to work towards.
